name: Collective Self-Esteem Scale
description: A 16-item measure of self-esteem derived from group memberships. Includes four subscales: membership esteem, private collective self-esteem, public collective self-esteem, and importance to identity.
reference: Luhtanen, R., & Crocker, J. (1992). A Collective Self-Esteem Scale: Self-evaluation of one's social identity. Personality and Social Psychology Bulletin, 18(3), 302-318.
instructions: We are all members of different social groups or social categories. Some of such social groups or categories pertain to gender, race, religion, nationality, ethnicity, and socioeconomic class. We would like you to consider your memberships in those particular groups or categories, and respond to the following statements on the basis of how you feel about those groups and your membership in them.

questions.name: cses_1
questions.description: I am a worthy member of the social groups I belong to.

questions.name: cses_2
questions.description: I often regret that I belong to some of the social groups I do.

questions.name: cses_3
questions.description: Overall, my social groups are considered good by others.

questions.name: cses_4
questions.description: Overall, my group memberships have very little to do with how I feel about myself.

questions.name: cses_5
questions.description: I feel I don't have much to offer to the social groups I belong to.

questions.name: cses_6
questions.description: In general, I'm glad to be a member of the social groups I belong to.

questions.name: cses_7
questions.description: Most people consider my social groups, on the average, to be more ineffective than other social groups.

questions.name: cses_8
questions.description: The social groups I belong to are an important reflection of who I am.

questions.name: cses_9
questions.description: I am a cooperative participant in the social groups I belong to.

questions.name: cses_10
questions.description: Overall, I often feel that the social groups of which I am a member are not worthwhile.

questions.name: cses_11
questions.description: In general, others respect the social groups that I am a member of.

questions.name: cses_12
questions.description: The social groups I belong to are unimportant to my sense of what kind of a person I am.

questions.name: cses_13
questions.description: I often feel I'm a useless member of my social groups.

questions.name: cses_14
questions.description: I feel good about the social groups I belong to.

questions.name: cses_15
questions.description: In general, others think that the social groups I am a member of are unworthy.

questions.name: cses_16
questions.description: In general, belonging to social groups is an important part of my self-image.
